column2: The Appellant contends that the Proforma Invoice represents the first step in the

column1: process of importing goods, signifying the contract between the buyer and the seller. The
fact that the Proforma Invoice is issued in the name of the local customer and the payment

column2: is  made  directly  to  the  Principal  confirms  that  the  material

column1: supply/transaction  concerning  machines  and  spares  supplied  directly
